name: Hygge Homes
description:
Hygge Homes is a cozy game of crafting little homes for your faerie friends in a magical forest where they all live together. Some of them are friends, are rivals, and everyone wants an adorable beautiful place to call their home. Gather crafting items as you explore the forest. Personalize the homes you craft by listening your faerie friends!

Hygge Homes is intended to be low-visibility/blind accessible. While our audio team admits there are still things to be designed to be fully accessible, we did the best we could with the time we had. Please follow our dev log as we continue this journey, and thank you for any and all feedback.

The game is played entirely with a mouse. Click on characters to speak with them, and click on objects to collect them. Use move and rotate buttons in the crafting menu to assemble items and create furniture for characters.
